正.definition: straight; upright; proper; main; principal; to correct; to rectify; exactly; just (at that time); right (in that place); (math.) positive

正中.definition: middle; center; right in the middle or center; nub

正中要害.definition: to hit the nail on the head (idiom)

正主.definition: central figure; rightful owner; (slang) idol of a fan

正倉院.definition: Shōsō-in, a timber structure in Nara, Japan, built to house hundreds of artifacts bequeathed to the Tōdai-ji temple by the Japanese emperor Shōmu, who died in 756

正值.definition: just at the time of; honest; upright; (math.) positive value

正傳.definition: main subject of long novel; true biography

正反.definition: positive and negative; pros and cons; inside and outside

正反兩面.definition: two-way; reversible; both sides of the coin

正史.definition: the 24 or 25 official dynastic histories; true history, as opposed to fictional adaptation or popular legends

正名.definition: to replace the current name or title of sth with a new one that reflects its true nature; rectification of names (a tenet of Confucian philosophy)

正品.definition: certified goods; quality product; normal product; A-class goods

正在.definition: to be in the process of (doing sth); to be currently ...-ing

正外部性.definition: positive influence, effect that people's doings or behavior have on others (society)

正太.definition: young, cute boy; derived from Japanese loanword shotacon 正太控[zheng4 tai4 kong4]

正太控.definition: shotacon (Japanese loanword); manga or anime genre depicting young boys in an erotic manner

正好.definition: just (in time); just right; just enough; to happen to; to chance to; by chance; it just so happens that

正子.definition: positron; also called 正電子|正电子[zheng4 dian4 zi3]

正字.definition: to correct an erroneously written character; regular script (calligraphy); standard form (of a character or spelling)

正字通.definition: Zhengzitong, Chinese character dictionary with 33,549 entries, edited by Ming scholar Zhang Zilie 張自烈|张自烈[Zhang1 Zi4 lie4] in 17th century

正安.definition: Zheng'an county in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

正安縣.definition: Zheng'an county in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

正宗.definition: orthodox school; fig. traditional; old school; authentic; genuine

正定.definition: Zhengding county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei

正定縣.definition: Zhengding county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei

正室.definition: primary wife (in contrast to concubine); legal wife

正寧.definition: Zhengning county in Qingyang 慶陽|庆阳[Qing4 yang2], Gansu

正寧縣.definition: Zhengning county in Qingyang 慶陽|庆阳[Qing4 yang2], Gansu

正巧.definition: just by chance; to happen to (just at the right time); opportune

正德.definition: Zhengde Emperor, reign name of eleventh Ming emperor Zhu Houzhao 朱厚照[Zhu1 Hou4 zhao4] (1491-1521), reigned 1505-1521, temple name 明武宗[Ming2 Wu3 zong1]

正房.definition: central building (in a traditional house); primary wife

正教.definition: lit. true religion; orthodox religion; orthodox Christianity; Islam (in the writing of Chinese or Hui theologians)

正教真詮.definition: Exegesis of the Right Religion by Wang Daiyu 王岱輿|王岱舆[Wang2 Dai4yu2], a study of Islam published during the Ming dynasty

正文.definition: main text (as opposed to footnotes); main body (of a book)

正方.definition: the side in favor of the proposition (in a formal debate)

正日.definition: the day (of a festival, ceremony etc)

正旦.definition: starring female role in a Chinese opera

正月.definition: first month of the lunar year

正月初一.definition: New Year's Day in the lunar calendar

正朔.definition: first day of the first lunar month; (old) calendar promulgated by the first emperor of a dynasty

正本.definition: original (of a document); reserved copy (of a library book)

正步走.definition: to march at parade step; March! (military command)

正殿.definition: main hall of a Buddhist temple

正氣.definition: healthy atmosphere; moral spirit; unyielding integrity; probity; (TCM) vital energy (resistance to diseases)

正派.definition: (of a person) upright; respectable; decent; (Tw) (of a business etc) reputable

正然.definition: in the process of (doing something or happening); while (doing)

正版.definition: genuine; legal; see also 盜版|盗版[dao4 ban3]

正生.definition: starring male role in a Chinese opera

正當年.definition: to be in the prime of life

正當時.definition: the right time for sth; the right season (for planting cabbage)

正眼.definition: facing directly (with one's eyes); (to look sb) in the eyes

正祖.definition: Jeonjo (1752-1800), 22nd king of Korean Joseon dynasty

正統.definition: orthodoxy; tradition; orthodox; traditional; principles of dynastic succession; (of an heir) legitimate

正經.definition: decent; honorable; proper; serious; according to standards

正經事.definition: an important matter (sth work-related or productive etc)

正經八擺.definition: variant of 正經八百|正经八百[zheng4 jing1 ba1 bai3]

正經八板.definition: see 正經八百|正经八百[zheng4 jing1 ba1 bai3]

正職.definition: main job; day job; steady full-time job (as opposed to temporary or casual); chief or principal post (as opposed to deputy)

正腳鞋.definition: shoe that can be worn on either foot

正臉.definition: a person's face as seen from the front

正色.definition: stern; grim; resolute; firm; unflinching; fundamental colors

正藍旗.definition: Plain Blue banner or Shuluun Höh khoshuu in Xilingol League 錫林郭勒盟|锡林郭勒盟[Xi1 lin2 guo1 le4 Meng2], Inner Mongolia; also written 正蘭旗|正兰旗

正蘭旗.definition: Plain Blue banner or Shuluun Höh khoshuu in Xilingol League 錫林郭勒盟|锡林郭勒盟[Xi1 lin2 guo1 le4 Meng2], Inner Mongolia

正要.definition: to be just about to; to be on the point of

正視.definition: to face squarely; to meet head on; to face up to

正言厲色.definition: solemn in word and countenance (idiom); strict and unsmiling; also written 正顏厲色|正颜厉色

正誤.definition: true or false?; correct or incorrect; to correct errors (in a document)

正路.definition: (lit. and fig.) the right way; the correct path; the proper course

正逢其時.definition: to come at the right time; to be opportune

正道.definition: the correct path; the right way (Buddhism)

正邪.definition: opposition between vital energy 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4] and pathogeny 邪氣|邪气[xie2 qi4] (TCM)

正邪相爭.definition: term in TCM describing the progress of disease as an opposition between vital energy 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4] and pathogeny 邪氣|邪气[xie2 qi4]

正鋒.definition: (calligraphy) technique in which the shaft of the brush is kept upright, so that the tip of the brush runs along the center of the stroke (cf. 側鋒|侧锋[ce4feng1] and 偏鋒|偏锋[pian1feng1])

正鑲白旗.definition: Plain and Bordered White banner or Shuluun Hövööt Chagaan khoshuu in Xilingol League 錫林郭勒盟|锡林郭勒盟[Xi1 lin2 guo1 le4 Meng2], Inner Mongolia

正長石.definition: orthoclase KAlSi3O8 (rock-forming mineral, type of feldspar)

正陽.definition: Zhengyang county in Zhumadian 駐馬店|驻马店[Zhu4 ma3 dian4], Henan

正陽縣.definition: Zhengyang county in Zhumadian 駐馬店|驻马店[Zhu4 ma3 dian4], Henan

正電子照射斷層攝影.pinyin: zhèng diàn zi zhào shè duàn céng shè yǐng

正電子發射層析.pinyin: zhèng diàn zi fā shè céng xī

正電子發射斷層照相術.pinyin: zhèng diàn zi fā shè duàn céng zhào xiàng shù

正面.definition: front; obverse side; right side; positive; direct; open

正音.definition: standard pronunciation; to correct sb's pronunciation

正顏厲色.definition: solemn in countenance (idiom); strict and unsmiling

正駕駛.definition: pilot-in-command; captain (cf. 副駕駛|副驾驶[fu4jia4shi3], copilot)

正骨八法.definition: the eight methods of bonesetting; Chinese osteopathy

正體.definition: standard form (of a Chinese character); plain font style (as opposed to bold or italic); printed style (as opposed to cursive); (Tw) traditional (i.e. unsimplified) characters

正體字.definition: standard form of a Chinese character; (Tw) traditional (i.e. unsimplified) characters

正點.definition: (of a train etc) on time; punctual; (slang) awesome; (Tw) on the hour
